title: Ep 150 | What Phil Wants in a SCOTUS Pick, Jase Introduces Trump Jr. & Who Determines the Truth?
description:
Phil shares his wisdom about the nominee to replace Ruth Bader Ginsburg and notes the vast difference between the Supreme Court and the Supreme Being. Jase describes his experience introducing Donald Trump Jr. at a recent fundraiser. And Phil, Jase, and Zach discuss who gets to determine the truth, whether or not heaven is a place, the role faith plays when you vote, and what President Trump has done for people of faith.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
